00017     class ServiceManager

00022         public event Action OnLocationSend = null;
00023 
00024         #region PRIVATE_FIELDS
00025         private static int NOT_SPECIFIED = -1;
00026         private static string DEFAULT_TRIP_DESCRIPTION = "Trip started on {0}";
00027         
00028         private TripServiceClient service = null;
00029         private SendScheduler scheduler = null;
00030         private PositionNode lastPositionNode = null;
00031         private Trip[] userTrips = null;
00032 
00033         private int currentTripId = NOT_SPECIFIED; 
00034         private int sendFrequency = 10000;
00035         private bool tripRunning = false;
00036         #endregion
00037 
00041         public ServiceManager()
00042         {
00043             EndpointAddress endpoint = new EndpointAddress(MobileConfiguration.WCFAddress);
00044             service = new TripServiceClient(new BasicHttpBinding(), endpoint);
00045             scheduler = new SendScheduler();
00046         }
00047 
00052         public void ContinueTrip(Trip trip)
00053         {
00054             currentTripId = trip.ID;
00055             RunTrip();
00056         }
00057 
00063         public int RunNewTrip(string tripName)
00064         {
00065             string description = string.Format(DEFAULT_TRIP_DESCRIPTION, DateTime.Now);
00066             currentTripId = service.CreateNewTrip(User.Login, tripName, description);
00067             RunTrip();
00068             return currentTripId;
00069         }
00070 
00074         private void RunTrip()
00075         {
00076             scheduler.Start(sendFrequency, SendPosition);
00077             tripRunning = true;
00078             userTrips = null;
00079         }
00080 
00085         private void SendPosition(GpsPosition position)
00086         {
00087             if (!tripRunning && currentTripId != -1)
00088                 return;
00089 
00090             PositionNode node = position.GetPositionNode();
00091             node.TripIDSpecified = true;
00092             node.TripID = currentTripId;
00093 
00094             int nodeId = service.AddPositionNode(node);
00095             node.OrdinalNumber = nodeId;
00096             lastPositionNode = node;
00097 
00098             if (OnLocationSend != null)
00099                 OnLocationSend();
00100         }
00101         
00105         public void StopTrip()
00106         {
00107             tripRunning = false;
00108             scheduler.Dispose();         
00109         }
00110         
00115         public void UpdatePositionNode(int tripId, int nodeNumber, string description)
00116         {
00117             service.UpdatePositionNodeDescription(tripId, nodeNumber, description);
00118         }
00119 
00125         public PositionNode[] GetPositionNodesForTrip(int tripId)
00126         {
00127             return service.GetPositionNodesForTrip(tripId);
00128         }
00129 
00136         public bool LoginUser(string name, string password)
00137         {
00138             string result = service.LoginUser(name, password);
00139             return result != String.Empty;
00140         }

00157             set { sendFrequency = value * 1000; }

00164         {
00165             get
00166             {
00167                 if (userTrips == null)
00168                     userTrips = service.GetTripsForUser(User.Login);
00169                 return userTrips;

00178             get { return lastPositionNode; }

00186         private class SendScheduler : IDisposable
00187         {
00188             private Action<GpsPosition> OnTimeElapsed = null;
00189             private Timer timer = null;
00190             private GpsPosition currentPosition = null;
00191             private bool positionChanged = false;
00192             private static readonly object padlock = new object();
00193 
00194             public SendScheduler() { }
00195 
00201             public void Start(int frequency, Action<GpsPosition> positionDelegate)
00202             {  
00203                 this.OnTimeElapsed = positionDelegate;
00204 
00205                 GPSListener gpsListener = GPSListener.GetInstance;
00206                 gpsListener.OnLocationChanged += new Action<GpsPosition>(ReceivePositionFromGps);
00207                 gpsListener.OpenGPS();
00208 
00209                 timer = new Timer(new TimerCallback(TimerMethod), null, 0, frequency);
00210             }
00211 
00216             private void TimerMethod(Object stateInfo)
00217             {
00218                 if (OnTimeElapsed != null)
00219                 {
00220                     lock (padlock)
00221                     {
00222                         if (currentPosition != null && positionChanged)
00223                         {
00224                             OnTimeElapsed(this.currentPosition);
00225                             positionChanged = false;
00226                         }
00227                     }
00228                 }
00229             }
00230 
00235             public void ReceivePositionFromGps(GpsPosition position)
00236             {
00237                 lock (padlock)
00238                 {
00239                     this.currentPosition = position;
00240                     positionChanged = true;
00241                 }
00242             }
00243 
00244             #region IDisposable Members
00245 
00249             public void Dispose()
00250             {   
00251                 timer.Dispose();
00252                 
00253                 GPSListener gpsListener = GPSListener.GetInstance;
00254                 gpsListener.OnLocationChanged -= new Action<GpsPosition>(ReceivePositionFromGps);
00255                 gpsListener.CloseGPS();
00256             }
00257 
00258             #endregion
00259         }
00260     }
